It also wipes your current game, so back it up :)

Is it "Unlocked" or "Added" ?
Because this feature wasn't placed by the 2k devs... That's for sure. I ended the game twice in normal and hard and nothing has unlocked, so it's more like an addition.

"Enables" is probably a better desctiption, it enables the pre-existing free-ride option.

New version (Update 2): http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5821243

This really does work!

I have a question, can you save in freeride?

By the way if you take the Smith Custom 200 Police Special from the garage, the buttons that usually change the radio stations turn the siren off and on!

But be careful! As soon as you take this car out of Joey's yard, you will be wanted by the police!
Also, you can't get the cars fixed at the garages ! (at least not the ones with the wrench sign outside).
